EmailTemplate.description: cloned from the 016 GET Webinar reminder
EmailTemplate.name: Global_Email_GET Partner Newsletter_2018.018 February 2019 GET Webinar reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Education Certifications Webinar - Wednesday, Feb 20, 2PM EST
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
This Wednesday we will welcome Dylan and John from Pivotal Education to the Global Ecosystem webinar series! Dylan and John work on the Platform Acceleration Lab (PAL) team and have been working hard to create a series of certifications around Cloud Native practices. In this webinar they will discuss:
- Why the education team developed the Pivotal Developer and Application Architect certifications
- What makes up the certification exam, and what you get when you earn your certification
- How to prepare for the exams
- Bulk discounts and bundling options for Partners who want to certify their teams - Plenty of time for questions
Date: Wednesday, February 20, 2019 Time: 2PM EST / 11AM PST
Looking forward to seeing you there!
Thank you, Adam, on behalf of the Pivotal Global Ecosystem Team Register here <[[https://partners.pivotal.io/English/webinars-events.aspx]]>
